c2effect.name: Textured Tunnel
c2effect.description: Textured Tunnel - requires modified Sprite plugin
c2effect.author: GamesWarp Studio

param.name: X-Coord
param.description: X coord of mouse point. Use Mouse.X on mouse location. A logic error is still present, so use -1.0 to center the location

param.name: Y-Coord
param.description: Y coord of mouse point. Use LayoutHeight - Mouse.Y for mouse location. The Y-Axis is currently reversed in C2. Use -1.0 to center the location

param.name: Speed
param.description: Speed. Use any value between -1 and +1. Use 0 to stop movement.

param.name: Angular Velocity
param.description: Angular Velocity. Use any value between -1 and +1. Use 0 to stop rotation.
